ha ee aashritha adhyapana katayuthu sambandha prashna walaki.

mahabodhi buddhagaya wiharayata ellawu milechcha thrasthrawadi praharaya tharaye hela dakina bawa bauddha, hindu, kristhiyani, islam pujaka uthumangen samanwitha anthar aagamika sanwidhanaya awadharanaya karathi.jathiwadaya ha aagamwadaya wapurana anthawadi thrastha sanwidhana lokayenma athuga damimata sawoma ekwiya yuthu yayi anthar aagamika sanwidhanaye sama sabhapathiwaru penwa dethi.anthar aagamika sanwidhanaye pujaka uthumanla ese prakasha kale eeye (08) kolambaa di pawathi wishesha madhya hamuwata ekwemini.mehidi adahas pala kala anthar aagamika sanwidhanaye sama sabhapathi galagama dhammaransi himiyo mese pawasuha.lokawasi bauddhayange hadawatha badu mahabodhi buddhagaya wiharayata ella kala praharayen ehi wadum pidum sandaha wadamawu miyanmaraye bhikshun wahanse denamak ha wandana nadayak thuwala labuwa.
